full_summary:
# Standard & Poor’s Rating Direct Global Issuers Subscription
## Tender Announcement
### Reference: CB-8006-34511367
#### Amendment: 2
#### Solicitation: 20230940
#### Publish Date: August 9, 2023
#### Tender Close Date: August 25, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST)

The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions Canada (OSFI) invites interested suppliers to provide Standard & Poor’s Ratings Direct Global Issuers subscription services for all regions, including library research. This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canadian-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

The proposed contract is for a period of one (1) year with one (1) option to extend for an additional year. The estimated value of the contract, including the option period, is $525,000 USD (no taxes included).

### Pre-Identified Supplier
S&P Global Market Intelligence has been pre-identified as the preferred supplier for this contract.

### Requirements
Any interested supplier must demonstrate by way of a statement of capabilities that they meet the following requirements:

* The ability to deliver Standard & Poor’s Ratings Direct Global Issuers for all regions and library research services, on a monthly basis, to the Toronto office of OSFI.

### Evaluation Criteria
 Suppliers will be assessed based on their ability to meet the required requirements.

### Invitation to Participate
Suppliers are invited to participate in the tender process by submitting a statement of capabilities to the Contracting Authority identified in this Notice on or before the closing date of August 25, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST).

### Contact Information
Chris Zaremba
Senior Contracting Officer
contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca
(613) 298-5128
255 Albert Street, 12th Floor
Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0H2

### Supporting Documents
The tender notice and related documents can be downloaded from the Government of Canada’s electronic tendering system.

### Attachment
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8006/acan---standard-and-poors-%28english.pdf

(English only)

The documents are available in English only; however, suppliers may request a French translation of the documents.

Note: This is a reproduction in professional tone and structure of the original document, which contained inaccuracies and unclear formatting of the French and
